column10:
Crossing from the north (especially) or south side of Lee Jackson Memorial Hwy (U.S. Route 50) at the pedestrian crossing. Using the pedestrian crossing signal request.
There is a slight delay in the light changes for pedestrians to cross, but it is TOO SHORT a delay. Any cars from Alder Woods Drive immediately react to the green light to turn left onto U.S. 50 East, and reach the eastbound lanes just as pedestrians from the north side of U.S. 50 arrive to cross it.
I have had 2 near-misses personally and observed 2 more when crossing from the south side.
column21: This is an outstanding resource and I will use it henceforth.
